entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sutton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries and ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
